title: User information not updated in the tenant
content:
One of the following problems occurs after the system synchronizes the user information to the tenant:

  • When you add a new user in Suite Administration, this user can't log in to the tenant.
  • The updated information of existing users is not reflected in the tenant.

Cause

You can contact the tenant administrator to check if the user's User Principal Name (UPN) is the same as any user group's UPN.

Solution

For users with DB authentication type only:

If the user's UPN is the same as any user group's UPN, delete this user from Suite Administration and create another user with a different UPN.
